FuncDef:
The qppb local-policy command creates a QPPB local policy.
The undo qppb local-policy command deletes a QPPB local policy.
By default, no QPPB local policy is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a QPPB local policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
QPPB implementation requires a QPPB local policy. After QoS local IDs and traffic behaviors are bound in a QPPB local policy, you can apply the QPPB local policy to an interface.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, a QPPB local policy is created in the system. QPPB takes effect only after the QPPB local policy is applied to an interface.
